DESC - Description:
3E 433:

I've spent many years adventuring in Morrowind.  Now I feel myself growing restless, yearning for something new.  

As luck should have it, a new opportunity has presented itself: the nobles from the Great Houses have put aside their differences and formed an expedition to Akavir.  They have requested that I lead the journey.  

I must decide if I want to accept this offer...
